name: configure_plan
body: let plan_state = & mut ctx . accounts . plan_state ;
plan_state . owner = ctx . accounts . owner . key () ;

name: disperse
body: token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . source_tokens . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . intermediate_tokens . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . owner . to_account_info () , }) , first_part) ? ;

token :: approve (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . external_program . clone () , Approve { to : ctx . accounts . intermediate_tokens . to_account_info () , delegate : ctx . accounts . destination_tokens . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . owner . to_account_info () , }) , second_part) ? ;

token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . external_program . clone () , Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . intermediate_tokens . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . destination_tokens . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . owner . to_account_info () , }) , second_part) ? ;

token :: revoke (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . external_program . clone () , Revoke { source : ctx . accounts . intermediate_tokens . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . owner . to_account_info () , })) ? ;
ctx . accounts . plan_state . executions = ctx . accounts . plan_state . executions . saturating_add (1) ;
msg ! ("disperse completed: first={}, second={}" , first_part , second_part) ;
